statement: Grindr, a leading dating app for the LGBTQ+ community, has reported Q4 results that were in line with expectations, but shares fell due to slightly lower EBITDA guidance. statement: Kyverna Therapeutics, a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, focuses on developing cell therapies for autoimmune diseases. Morgan Healthcare Conference. The psoriatic arthritis market is shifting with the growth of biosimilars, offering new standards of care.
